      Parameters:

    • getSizeControlDecorator

      public static ICommunication getSizeControlDecorator​(ICommunication mainCommunication)
      Create decorator communication. Decorator provides size control for messages In head of message add ASCII-HEX value, contains length of next message
      Parameters:
      mainCommunication - communication for decoration
      Returns:
      null, if decorator not created
